main event: An observer reported seeing two elongated metallic objects with a reddish-orange glow over Fairview, Ohio on October 7, 1968.
interesting points: The objects approached slowly and hovered nearby, allowing for detailed observation,One object was about twice the size of the other,The objects had no visible means of propulsion,They glowed with a distinct reddish-orange color,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes before the objects rapidly ascended and disappeared.
sighted object: two elongated metallic objects with a reddish-orange glow
witness description: 17-year-old male with no special experience reported the sighting
